jetset.cosmo_tools Module¶

Module: cosmo_tools¶

This module contains the class Cosmo, implementing cosmological calculations following Hogg 1999 (http://arxiv.org/abs/astroph/9905116)

Classes and Inheritance Structure¶

Cosmo([units, Omega_m, Omega_l, Omega_k, …]) This class sets-up a cosmological framework to evalute comosmological distances and volume.

Classes relations¶

Module API¶

Classes¶

Cosmo([units, Omega_m, Omega_l, Omega_k, …]) This class sets-up a cosmological framework to evalute comosmological distances and volume.
